thread.title: Donald
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Donald

author: Donald
title: Donald
text: My Pelican PSE1800 water system arrived within 48 hours of ordering. The installation was fairly easy even for someone like me with little plumbing experience. The system took a couple of days to clean the pipes in our 65 year old house but now the water is crystal clear and actually tastes good. My morning coffee tastes great too and my wife loves the way the water feels when she is relaxing in her whirlpool bath.
